channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Premiere
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Premiere

item.title: CVE-2021-35997|2024-08-04T00:47:42.562Z -- adobe -- premiere
item.description: Adobe Premiere Pro version 15.2 (and earlier) is affected by a memory corruption vulnerability when parsing a specially crafted file. An unauthenticated attacker could leverage this vulnerability to achieve arbitrary code execution in the context of the current user. Exploitation of this issue requires user interaction in that a victim must open a malicious file.
